titles.title: Unredeemed U.S. Savings Bond Return Act of 2006
To establish a program to reunite bondholders with matured unredeemed Federal savings bonds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/28/2006--Introduced. Unredeemed U.S. Savings Bond Return Act of 2006 - Instructs the Secretary of the Treasury to prescribe regulations authorizing states to enter into owner location and claims agreements with the Secretary in order to: (1) locate owners of specified unredeemed savings bonds; (2) identify such owners; and (3) process and verify claims for the redemption of such savings bonds.
